statements: DELETE FROM team_performance_reports WHERE team_name = 'Sales Team';
DELETE FROM team_performance_reports WHERE team_name = 'Marketing' AND project_outcome = 'Success';
DELETE FROM team_performance_reports WHERE performance_metric < 0.5 AND productivity_metric > 0.8;
DELETE FROM team_performance WHERE team_id = 1 AND team_name = 'Engineering Team'
DELETE FROM productivity_metrics WHERE metric_id = 100 AND metric_name = 'Productivity Score'
DELETE FROM project_outcomes WHERE success = FALSE;
DELETE FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 3 AND role = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM project_outcomes WHERE outcome_description LIKE '%satisfactory%';
